examples.example: 我一直努力学习英语，相信未来能取得更大的进步。

translate.english: I have been studying English hard and believe that I can make greater progress in the future.

examples.example: 我每天都会花时间学习英语，这让我感到充实又快乐。

translate.english: I spend time learning English every day, which makes me feel full and happy.

examples.example: 我很喜欢用英语和朋友们交流，这让我们的沟通更加顺畅和有趣。

translate.english: I really like to communicate with friends in English, which makes our communication more smooth and interesting.
